entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 9:12 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -16.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -23.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
